dt.t: the social services upon which public revenue is {wi}expended{/wi}

dt: {bc}to make use of for a specific purpose {bc}{sx|utilize||}

dt.t: projects on which they {wi}expended{/wi} great energy

et: Middle English, from Latin {it}expendere{/it} to weigh out, expend, from {it}ex-{/it} + {it}pendere{/it} to weigh {ma}{mat|spin|}{/ma}
shortdef: to make use of for a specific purpose : utilize; also : use up
